mapper.select: SELECT se.`sizename`,cd.`colorname`,sp.`shopname`,sp.`price`,sp.`proreview` FROM `shopstock` sk INNER JOIN `size` se ON sk.`sizeid`=se.`sizeid` INNER JOIN `colors` cd ON sk.`colorid`=cd.`colorid` INNER JOIN `shop` sp ON sk.`shopid`=sp.`shopid` WHERE sk.`shopid`=#{id} GROUP BY cd.`colorname`
SELECT se.`sizename` FROM `shopstock` sk INNER JOIN `size` se ON sk.`sizeid`=se.`sizeid` WHERE sk.`shopid`=#{id} GROUP BY se.`sizename`
